title: gambhIra gaNanAyakA
sahitya:
gambhIra gaNanAyakA pAda sharaNam shrngAra phaladAyakA mAmava sampadam rAja


anupallavi

  shambhu kadali phla bhakSitam Ekadantam brahmmantra vidyAm tvam sambOdhanam kuru


caraNam    Ananda pavana stitham bhaktarAjam aNimAdi stithi dAyakam kapila varNam
					(madhyamakAla)
nAga yajnOpa vighna dhAriNam kAma dAyini pITha vAsinam 
shrI guha vallI vivAha kAraNam mUSika vAhanam mOdaka hastam
